name: Samsung Galaxy S6
description: The Samsung Galaxy S6 runs on Android OS, v5.0 (Lollipop) and is powered by Quad-core 1.3 GHz Cortex-A53 & Quad-core 1.9 GHz Cortex-A57 processor with 3GB RAM. It has a 5.1-inch, 1440 x 2560 pixel display. The Samsung Galaxy S6 also comes with a 16.0-megapixel camera that is able to record videos at 2160p. It comes with 32GB of built-in storage, and is able to support microSD cards of up to 128GB.

processor_memory.cpu: Quad-core 1.5 GHz Cortex-A53, Quad-core 2.1 GHz Cortex-A57

body.dimensions: 143.4 x 70.5 x 6.8 (height x width x thickness)(mm)
body.available_colors: Charcoal Black, Copper Gold, Electric Blue, Shimmery White

software.messaging: SMS, MMS, Email, Push Email, IM
software.others: SNS applications, Google Search, Maps, Gmail, YouTube, Google Talk, Document viewer, Photo viewer/editor

connectivity.sensor: Accelerometer, Barometer, Compass, Gesture, Gyro, Heart rate, Proximity

camera.secondary_camera: 5 MP, 1080p@30fps, dual video call, Auto HDR
camera.extra_features: Phase detection autofocus, LED flash, Dual Shot, Simultaneous HD video and image recording, geo-tagging, touch focus, face/smile detection, HDR
